DOC.brief_summary: The study design national multi-centered cluster randomize control trial involve 70,000 child adolescent age 7-18 year 7 province China . In center , 12-16 primary secondary school , totally least 10000 participant randomly select ( Primary : Secondary=1:1 ) . All select school randomly allocate either intervention control group ( Intervention : Control=1:1 ) .The multi-components school-based family-involved scheme conduct within intervention group 9 month , student control group follow usual health practice . The intervention consist four component : ) Create supportive school family environment , b ) Health lifestyle education relate compulsory physical activity , c ) Instruct promote school physical education , ) Self-monitor obesity relate behavior . Four type outcomes include anthropometric , behavioral , blood chemical physical fitness measure assess effectiveness intervention program .
